waypoints.title: Waypoints
waypoints.description: Curated discoveries and reference points captured along the path of inquiry.
waypoints.longDescription: A digital atlas where ideas are mapped, explored and connected. Some waypoints are newly discovered, others have become landmarks.

books.title: Books
books.description: Books I am reading or have read, along with my highlights and notes.
books.longDescription: The books that have shaped, inspired and accompanied me. A collection of technical, narrative and personal growth readings.

writings.title: Writings
writings.description: A portfolio of long-form essays, thoughts, and articles I have written.
writings.longDescription: Articles and reflections on engineering, design systems, technical leadership and the lessons learned along the way.

hikes.title: Hikes
hikes.description: Physical expeditions and real-world traversals, documented one step at a time.
hikes.longDescription: Every hike leaves a mark. Here you'll find my favorite routes through the Lepini Mountains, Circeo National Park and the mountains I call home.
